channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Melts Down Over Not Being Able To Rig His Own Trial
item.description: Trump was bordering on incoherent as he angrily spoke outside of the courthouse after jury deliberations ended for the day.

item.title: Two Illegal Aliens Attempt to Breach U.S. Military Base, Dangerous Trend Continues Under Biden
item.description: Two Jordanian illegal aliens are in ICE custody awaiting deportation proceedings after attempting to breach the Marine Corps base in Quantico, Virginia, earlier this month. To read the rest of the article click here The post Two Illegal Aliens Attempt to Breach U.S. Military Base, Dangerous Trend Continues Under Biden appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: House Democrats Demand Answers From Chief Justice Roberts On Alito And SCOTUS Ethics Rules
item.description: House Democrats sent a letter to Chief Justice John Roberts demanding that he answer questions about whether the Supreme Court will enforce their ethics rules on Alito.

item.title: Déjà Vu: Two Middle Eastern Illegal Aliens Attempt to Enter Secure Virginia Military Facility in a Box Truck
item.description: On May 3, two Jordanian illegal aliens were apprehended as they attempted to enter the Marine Corps base in Quantico, Virginia, in a box truck. The two were posing as Amazon delivery drivers, although Amazon denies that they were employed by the company. To read the rest of the article click here The post Déjà Vu: Two Middle Eastern Illegal Aliens Attempt to Enter Secure Virginia Military Facility in a Box Truck appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Justice Alito Refuses To Recuse Himself On 1/6 Cases
item.description: Supreme Court Justice Samuel Alito has rejected a request from top Senate Democrats to recuse himself from upcoming cases related to the 1/6 attack.

item.title: Tunisia Cracks Down on Africans Migrants: Outsourcing Border Security
item.description: Tunisia is fighting a battle with illegal immigrants from other parts of Africa trying to use the country as a launch pad towards their ultimate destination, Europe. The North African country is close to the Italian coast and even closer to Italy’s smaller outlying islands. To read the rest of the article click here The post Tunisia Cracks Down on Africans Migrants: Outsourcing Border Security appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: A Conviction Could Wreck Trump With Senior Voters
item.description: GOP strategist and CNN contributor Scott Jennings said that a conviction could harm Trump with senior citizen voters in the 2024 election.

item.title: Britain’s Migrant Boat Headache
item.description: Britain continues to see waves of boats landing on its coast carrying illegal immigrants. The sight of dinghies being towed to shore and migrant men disembarking has become a regular sight. To read the rest of the article click here The post Britain’s Migrant Boat Headache appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Trump Sounds Like He Knows He’s Going To Be Convicted
item.description: Trump didn't sound confident as he left the courtroom, but instead seemed to already be trying to spin a guilty verdict.

item.title: Your City Doesn’t Have a Migrant Crisis Yet? Just Ask Denver for its New How-To Guide.
item.description: Denver city officials have just released a 22-page guide that comprehensively details how to house, feed, clothe, employ, and otherwise subsidize and reward illegal immigration. To read the rest of the article click here The post Your City Doesn’t Have a Migrant Crisis Yet? Just Ask Denver for its New How-To Guide. appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
